alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 1.9.1
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today, we are releasing Tweeten Beta 1.9.1 for Windows and Mac with a fix for TweetDeck's new improvements for the tweet actions. They have moved the tweet actions (like/rt buttons) to the left, and are now showing it by default. With 1.9.1, we've fixed the issue so that you don't see any weirdness on your timeline! You are welcome! :)

As usual, if you have any feedback, please let us know via Twitter (@tweetenapp). Happy Tweeting!
